descriptions: Routine i-th of the body (format: 'frequency:move1.move2.move3...'. See move codes here.
examples: at12h00:M2Lunch!.A99. -> Tell message 'Lunch!' at 12 every day and put arms up quickly
at08h00:M2Wake up!.D0.D0. -> Tell message 'Wake up!' at 8 every day and dance
never:D0. -> Dance 0 never (to disable the routine)
at20h00:Lry. -> Turn on RED led at 20h00
smTWtfsevery30mfrom6to18:M1Drink%20water!. -> Tell to 'Drink/water!' every 30 minutes from 6 until 18 on Tuesdays and Wednesdays
SMtwtfsat15h00:NBaby%eats!. -> Notify 'Baby eats!' at 15h00 on Sundays and Mondays
every10s:L?. -> Turn randomly all leds every 10 seconds

descriptions: Zone to pick up the current date-time from. See here.
Frequency at which the actor will act and perform its duty. See here.
examples: smTWtfsevery30mfrom6to18 -> Every 30 minutes from 06h until 18h on Tuesdays and Wednesdays
SMtwtfsat15h00 -> At 15h00 on Sundays and Mondays
oneoff    -> Once and go back to previous configuration

descriptions: Name of the event i-th to be used against IFTTT webhook service.
Bitmap of custom image i-th, represented in base 64. See here.
Flag telling if deep sleep mode is on (to reduce power consumption).
Determines which first moves will be executed randomly on button press. For instance, if set to 2, only moves 0 and 1 will be executed randomly.
